exceptions.exn: Unable to find an instance for the variables b, y.
Unable to find an instance for the variables b, y.
In environment a, x, y : lb H1 : a ⟂ x H2 : a ⟂ y H : forall x y : lb, x ≂ y -> forall x0 y0 : lb, x0 ≂ y0 -> x ⟂ x0 -> y ⟂ y0 Unable to unify "y ⟂ ?M1783" with "a ⟂ x ↑ y".

original: intros. split. - intros. split. + apply lb_ortho_anti; auto. + apply lb_ortho_anti; auto. - intros [H1 H2]. apply lb_ortho_iff with (x:=x) (y:=y); try auto. apply lb_ortho_sym; auto.
